title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 20
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 20
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his Chart of the Day "Nasdaq stocks, U.S. high-yield bonds on bubble watch." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.\u0010\u0010Alex Sherman\u0010Reporter:Mergers & Acquisitions\u0010Bloomberg Editorial\u0010Discussing Sprint, T-Mobile deal announcement is said to likely be delayed.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
